text: Happy birthday, Penelope Disick! Kourtney Kardashian's daughter turned 5 years old on Saturday, and the Kardashian family couldn't help but celebrate on social media. EXCLUSIVE : Kourtney Kardashian and Younes Bendjima Hit Up Le Club 55 in St. Tropez in Coordinating Ensembles Kourtney took to Snapchat to share pics of Penelope's birthday celebrations, writing ` ` My angel is 5!'' The 36 - year - old reality star also took to Instagram to share cute videos of Penelope's science experiment. part 1 A post shared by Kourtney Kardashian ( @ kourtneykardash ) on Jul 8, 2017 at 2 : 40pm PDT
